attributes.name: endpoint
attributes.description: The Hetzner Cloud API endpoint, can be used to override the default API Endpoint https://api.hetzner.cloud/v1.

attributes.name: endpoint_hetzner
attributes.description: The Hetzner API endpoint, can be used to override the default API Endpoint https://api.hetzner.com/v1.

attributes.name: poll_function
attributes.description: The type of function to be used during the polling.

attributes.name: poll_interval
attributes.description: The interval at which actions are polled by the client. Default `500ms`. Increase this interval if you run into rate limiting errors.

attributes.name: token
attributes.description: The Hetzner Cloud API token, can also be specified with the HCLOUD_TOKEN environment variable.

attributes.name: enable_public_interface
attributes.description: Wether the Load Balancer public interface is enabled. Default is `true`.

attributes.name: ip
attributes.description: IP to assign to the Load Balancer.

attributes.name: load_balancer_id
attributes.description: ID of the Load Balancer.

attributes.name: network_id
attributes.description: ID of the Network to attach the Load Balancer to. Using `subnet_id` is preferred. Required if `subnet_id` is not set. If `subnet_id` or `ip` are not set, the Load Balancer will be attached to the last subnet (ordered by `ip_range`).

attributes.name: subnet_id
attributes.description: ID of the Subnet to attach the Load Balancer to. Required if `network_id` is not set.

block.description: Manage the attachment of a Load Balancer in a Network in the Hetzner Cloud.

attributes.name: expose_routes_to_vswitch
attributes.description: Enable or disable exposing the routes to the vSwitch connection. The exposing only takes effect if a vSwitch connection is active.

attributes.name: alias_ips
attributes.description: Additional IPs to assign to the Server.

attributes.name: ip
attributes.description: IP to assign to the Server.

attributes.name: mac_address
attributes.description: MAC address of the Server on the Network.

attributes.name: network_id
attributes.description: ID of the Network to attach the Server to. Using `subnet_id` is preferred. Required if `subnet_id` is not set. If `subnet_id` or `ip` are not set, the Server will be attached to the last subnet (ordered by `ip_range`).

attributes.name: server_id
attributes.description: ID of the Server.

attributes.name: subnet_id
attributes.description: ID of the Subnet to attach the Server to. Required if `network_id` is not set.

block.description: Manage the attachment of a Server in a Network in the Hetzner Cloud.

attributes.name: fingerprint
attributes.description: Fingerprint of the SSH public key.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: ID of the SSH Key.

attributes.name: labels
attributes.description: User-defined [labels](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/cloud#labels) (key-value pairs) for the resource.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the SSH Key.

attributes.name: public_key
attributes.description: Public key of the SSH Key pair. If this is a file, it can be read using the `file` interpolation function.

block.description: Provides a Hetzner Cloud SSH Key resource to manage SSH Keys for server access.

reachable_externally
attributes.description: Whether access from outside the Hetzner network is allowed.

attributes.description: User-defined [labels](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/cloud#labels) (key-value pairs) for the resource.

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: Name of the Location.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the Storage Box.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: Password of the Storage Box. For more details, see the [Storage Boxes password policy](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/hetzner#storage-boxes-password-policy).

attributes.name: server
attributes.description: FQDN of the Storage Box.

attributes.name: snapshot_plan
day_of_month
attributes.description: Day of the month when the Snapshot Plan is executed. Null means every day.

attributes.name: day_of_week
attributes.description: Day of the week when the Snapshot Plan is executed. Starts at 0 for Sunday til 6 for Saturday. Note that this differs from the API, which uses 1 (Monday) through 7 (Sunday). Null means every day.

attributes.name: hour
attributes.description: Hour when the Snapshot Plan is executed (UTC).

attributes.name: max_snapshots
attributes.description: Maximum amount of Snapshots that will be created by this Snapshot Plan. Older Snapshots will be deleted.

attributes.name: minute
attributes.description: Minute when the Snapshot Plan is executed (UTC).
Details of the active snapshot plan.

attributes.name: ssh_keys
attributes.description: SSH public keys in OpenSSH format to inject into the Storage Box. It is not possible to update the SSH Keys through the API, so changing this attribute forces a replace of the Storage Box.

attributes.name: storage_box_type
attributes.description: Name of the Storage Box Type.

attributes.name: system
attributes.description: Host system of the Storage Box.

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: Primary username of the Storage Box.

block.description:
Provides a Hetzner Storage Box resource.

See the [Storage Box API documentation](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/hetzner#storage-boxes) for more details.

**Experimental:** Storage Box support is experimental, breaking changes may occur within minor releases.
See https://github.com/hetznercloud/terraform-provider-hcloud/issues/1285 for more details.

address
attributes.description: Public IPv4 or IPv6 address of the primary nameserver.

attributes.name: port

attributes.name: tsig_algorithm
attributes.description: Transaction signature (TSIG) algorithm used to generate the TSIG key.

attributes.name: tsig_key
attributes.description: Transaction signature (TSIG) key
Primary nameservers of the Zone. Forbidden when mode is primary and required when mode is secondary.

attributes.name: registrar
attributes.description: Registrar of the Zone.

attributes.name: ttl
attributes.description: Default Time To Live (TTL) of the Zone.

block.description:
Provides a Hetzner Cloud Zone resource.

This can be used to create, modify, and delete Zones.

For Internationalized domain names (IDN), see the `provider::hcloud::idna` function.

See the [Zones API documentation](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/cloud#zones) for more details.

attributes.name: change_protection
attributes.description: Whether change protection is enabled.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: ID of the Zone RRSet.

attributes.name: labels
attributes.description: User-defined [labels](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/cloud#labels) (key-value pairs) for the resource.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the Zone RRSet.

attributes.name: records
comment
attributes.description: Comment of the record.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value of the record.
Records of the Zone RRSet.

attributes.name: ttl
attributes.description: Time To Live (TTL) of the Zone RRSet.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the Zone RRSet.

attributes.name: zone
attributes.description: ID or Name of the parent Zone.

block.description:
Provides a Hetzner Cloud Zone Resource Record Set (RRSet) resource.

This can be used to create, modify, and delete Zone RRSets.

See the [Zone RRSets API documentation](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/cloud#zone-rrsets) for more details.

**RRSets of type TXT:**

The format of TXT records must consist of one or many quoted strings of 255 characters.

A helper function to format TXT record is available at `provider::hcloud::txt_record`.
See the examples for more details.

**RRSets of type SOA:**

SOA records are created or deleted by the Hetzner Cloud API when creating or deleting
the parent Zone, therefor this Terraform resource will:

- import the RRSet in the state, instead of creating it.
- remove the RRSet from the state, instead of deleting it.
- set the SOA record SERIAL value to 0 before saving it to the state, as this value is automatically
  incremented by the API and would cause issues otherwise.

block.description:
Provides a list of Hetzner Storage Box Subaccounts.

See the [Storage Box Subaccounts API documentation](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/hetzner#storage-box-subaccounts) for more details.

**Experimental:** Storage Box support is experimental, breaking changes may occur within minor releases.
See https://github.com/hetznercloud/terraform-provider-hcloud/issues/1285 for more details.

reachable_externally
attributes.description: Whether access from outside the Hetzner network is allowed.

attributes.description: Whether the Samba subsystem is enabled.

attributes.description: Whether the SSH subsystem is enabled.

attributes.description: Whether the WebDAV subsystem is enabled.

attributes.description: Whether the ZFS snapshot folder is visible.

attributes.description: User-defined [labels](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/cloud#labels) (key-value pairs) for the resource.

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: Name of the Location.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the Storage Box.

attributes.name: server
attributes.description: FQDN of the Storage Box.

attributes.name: snapshot_plan
day_of_month
attributes.description: Day of the month when the Snapshot Plan is executed. Null means every day.

attributes.name: day_of_week
attributes.description: Day of the week when the Snapshot Plan is executed. Starts at 0 for Sunday til 6 for Saturday. Note that this differs from the API, which uses 1 (Monday) through 7 (Sunday). Null means every day.

attributes.name: hour
attributes.description: Hour when the Snapshot Plan is executed (UTC).

attributes.name: max_snapshots
attributes.description: Maximum amount of Snapshots that will be created by this Snapshot Plan. Older Snapshots will be deleted.

attributes.name: minute
attributes.description: Minute when the Snapshot Plan is executed (UTC).
Details of the active snapshot plan.

attributes.name: storage_box_type
attributes.description: Name of the Storage Box Type.

attributes.description: Host system of the Storage Box.

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: Primary username of the Storage Box.

block.description:
Provides details about a Hetzner Cloud Zone.

For Internationalized domain names (IDN), see the `provider::hcloud::idna` function.

See the [Zones API documentation](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/cloud#zones) for more details.

idna.summary: Convert a Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) to ASCII
idna.description:
Converts a Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) to ASCII using Punycode.

The conversion is defined by Golang's IDNA package. See https://pkg.go.dev/golang.org/x/net/idna
for more details.

txt_record.description: Format a TXT record by splitting it in quoted strings of 255 characters.
